safetyTips: Contact free delivery - social distancing adhered to. Placing bag, knocking on door and standing back at a safe distance. Washing hands and hand gel between each address. Avoiding touching anything like gates etc. wherever possible.
name: DAISY ELEPHANT MEMORY QUILTS & CRAFT DEN
description: Daisy Elephant is a craft den and shop in Ashford town centre where people can go to do things like pottery decorating and sand art. During this time I am currently delivering all sorts of craft kits for all ages such as pottery decorating, sand art, painting by numbers, wooden shapes and foam clay. I offer a personalised service as I can tailor each craft bag to each individual.  To Order message on Facebook or Call / Text.
